alert.note: Alert for Northern Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 2:18PM MST until February 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Wind Chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Phillips County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The majority of the snowfall has moved through the area. Thus the Winter Storm Warning has been cancelled. A Winter Weather Advisory will remain in effect until 11 AM MST Monday for additional light snow, blowing snow and wind chills as low as 30 below zero.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
